snippet: The roster that compiled a 16-4 record in the postseason en route to the Stanley Cup returns intact, no small advantage in a lockout-shortened 48-game season.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings campaign to become first teams since Detroit Red Wings in 1998 to win back-to-back Stanley Cup championships begins with home game against Chicago Blackhawks; roster that compiled a 16-4 record in postseason returns intact, no small advantage in lockout-shortened 48-game season.
lead_paragraph: The roster that compiled a 16-4 record in the postseason en route to the Stanley Cup returns intact, no small advantage in a lockout-shortened 48-game season.

headline.seo: Los Angeles Kings Look to Defend Their Title
headline.main: Kings Have Stability and Tight Schedule on Their Side in Bid to Repeat
headline.print_headline: Kings Have Stability and Tight Schedule on Their Side in Bid to Repeat
